text: Ion Ibrian is a Moldovan footballer who plays for Codru Lozova, as a forward. ==Club career== On 26 November 2016, Ibrian made his professional debut with Zimbru Chișinău in a 2016–17 Divizia Națională match against Sheriff Tiraspol. ==References== ==External links== * *Ion Ibrian at uefa.com ==Notes== Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Moldovan footballers Category:FC Zimbru Chișinău players Category:Association football forwards
title: Ion Ibrian
